article.title: Raytheon Supports Missile Defense Agency AN/TPY-2 Radar Flight and Ground Testing
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: The Missile Defense Agency recently announced the award of a contract modification valued at more than $22 million to Raytheon Company Integrated Defense Systems, Woburn, Massachusetts. Raytheon will continue to provide support services for AN/TPY-2 radar flight and ground testing.Â The Missile Defense Agency is the contracting activity.
